metadata.notes: Dual-role bomber-fighter squadron operating specialized Blenheim IVF fighter variant. Conducted special operations from clandestine landing ground (LG-215) inside Libya during Operation Crusader. Squadron transitioned to long-range strike missions disrupting Axis supply lines on coastal road from Tripoli to Benghazi. Commander Wing Commander Reginald Stidolph, DFC (Rhodesian). Squadron predominantly staffed by Commonwealth personnel, particularly RAAF. Redeployed to Burma January 1942 after Operation Crusader.
